text:
Hey Zachary, I'm a writer and everyone has a different onboarding process, but recently I started working for an agency and it was incredible how they onboarded me. (my fav onboarding by far)

The process included loom videos for each step of the process, an organized clickup mastersheet, resources and links to ICP, briefs, how to interpret briefs and everything around it with a full play-by-play of how to make the most of ClickUp even.

IMO: Loom videos, SOPs and written guidelines along with references delivered in an easy to understand manner take the hat.
